name: darktango.vim
description:
Based on the color specifications of www.tango-project.org.

I've been using this color scheme, for a couple of weeks now. It's not complete but I really like it. For suggestions etc feel free to email me.

DarkTango, fits great with Tango desktop themes and all that is Tango-ish!

Enjoy!

Couple of screenshots (0.3):
http://flickr.com/photos/panosl/2321828928/in/photostream/
install_details: Drop it in  ~/vim/colors/ directory or the windows equivalent and activate through :colorscheme darktango

versions.release_notes:
Various small fixes and cleanup,
to bring up full tango support to the remaining objects.
Got rid of all the unfitting pure black (#000000) objects and some other minor fixes.
